00020     public class HeroPlaneObj : PlaneObj
00021     {
00022         public HeroPlaneObj(Texture2D sprite, int x, int y, int vx, int vy, int srcRectWidth, int srcRectHeight, double moveRate, int hp)
00023             : base(sprite, x, y, vx, vy, srcRectWidth, srcRectHeight, moveRate, hp){}
00024 
00025         internal override void Update(Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00026         {
00027             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState();
00028 
00029             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState.IsKeyDown(Keys.D1) && _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState.IsKeyUp(Keys.D1))
00030                 bulletSelection = 0;
00031 
00032             else if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState.IsKeyDown(Keys.D2) && _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState.IsKeyUp(Keys.D2))
00033                 bulletSelection = 1;
00034 
00035             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyUpPressed())
00036                 move(0, -1, velocity);
00037 
00038             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyDownPressed())
00039                 move(0, 1, velocity);
00040 
00041             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyLeftPressed())
00042                 move(-1, 0, velocity);
00043 
00044             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyRightPressed())
00045                 move(1, 0, velocity);
00046 
00047             /* The hero plane object does not use a behavior model, so this has to be hand-coded */
00048             if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyEnterPressed())
00049             {
00050                 if (Timer.elapsedMilliseconds() > BulletType[bulletSelection].BulletInterval)
00051                 {
00052                     shootStraight(bulletSelection, BulletType[bulletSelection].BulletAmount, BulletType[bulletSelection].BulletDensity, 3, MathHelper.Pi / 2);
00053                     Timer.reset();
00054                 }
00055             }
00056 
00057             if (position.X < _GLOBAL.Viewport.X)
00058                 position.X = 0;
00059 
00060             else if (position.X > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Width - Width)
00061                 position.X = _GLOBAL.Viewport.Width - Width;
00062 
00063             if (position.Y < _GLOBAL.Viewport.Y)
00064                 position.Y = 0;
00065 
00066             else if (position.Y > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height - Height)
00067                 position.Y = _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height - Height; ;
00068 
00069             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState = _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState;
00070 
00071             base.Update(map, gameTime);
00072         }
00073 
00074         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00075         {
00076             base.Draw(gameTime);
00077         }
00078 
00079         /* Adds a hero bullet object to the pool given the args */
00080         public override void addBulletPool(int index, float x, float y, double xDirection, double yDirection)
00081         {
00082             HeroBulletObj bullet = new HeroBulletObj(BulletType[index].sprite, x, y,
00083                 -BulletType[index].velocity.X, -BulletType[index].velocity.Y, BulletType[index].hitEffect,
00084                 BulletType[index].killable, BulletType[index].bounceable, (float)xDirection, (float)yDirection);
00085 
00086             BulletPool.Add(bullet);
00087         }
00088     }
